mapper.select: select a.no, a.userId, a.dongCode, si.sidoName, gu.gugunName, dong.dongName, base.lat, base.lng from area a left join sidocode si on left(a.dongcode,2) = left(si.sidocode,2) left join guguncode gu on left(a.dongcode, 5) = left(gu.guguncode, 5) left join dongcode dong on a.dongcode=dong.dongcode left join baseaddress base on a.dongcode=base.dongcode where a.userId=#{userId};
